022
023package org.opt4j.core.optimizer;
024
025import java.util.Collection;
026import java.util.HashSet;
027import java.util.Set;
028
029import org.opt4j.core.Individual;
030import org.opt4j.core.IndividualSet;
031import org.opt4j.core.common.archive.DefaultArchive;
032
033import com.google.inject.ImplementedBy;
034
035/**
036 * An {@link Archive} is used to store a set of high-quality {@link Individual}
037 * s. Commonly, these {@link Individual}s are non-dominated.
038 * 
039 * @author helwig, lukasiewycz
040 */
041@ImplementedBy(DefaultArchive.class)
042public abstract class Archive extends IndividualSet {
043
044        /**
045         * Updates the archive with a single individual.
046         * 
047         * @param individual
048         *            the individual that is used to update the archive
049         * @return returns {@code true} if the content of the archive changed
050         */
051        public boolean update(Individual individual) {
052                Set<Individual> set = new HashSet<>();
053                set.add(individual);
054                return update(set);
055        }
056
057        /**
058         * Updates the archive with a set of individuals. Instead of the {@code add}
059         * /{@code addAll} methods, which are prohibited for the archive (throwing
060         * an {@link UnsupportedOperationException}), this method shall be used.
061         * 
062         * @param individuals
063         *            the set of individuals that is used to update the archive
064         * @return returns {@code true} if the content of the archive changed
065         */
066        public abstract boolean update(Set<? extends Individual> individuals);
067
068        /**
069         * Adds the {@link Individual} to this {@link Archive} without further
070         * checks. Must be used only if the {@link Individual} is checked to be
071         * Pareto-dominant and, according to possible archive size restrictions, can
072         * be added to this {@link Archive}.
073         * 
074         * @param individual
075         *            the individual to be actually added to the archive
076         * @return true
077         */
078        protected boolean addCheckedIndividual(Individual individual) {
079                return super.add(individual);
080        }
081
082        /**
083         * Adds the {@link Individual}s to this {@link Archive} without further
084         * checks. Must be used only if the {@link Individual}s are checked to be
085         * Pareto-dominant and, according to possible archive size restrictions, can
086         * all be added to this {@link Archive}.
087         * 
088         * @param individuals
089         *            the individuals to be actually added to the archive
090         * @return true
091         */
092        protected boolean addCheckedIndividuals(Collection<? extends Individual> individuals) {
093                return super.addAll(individuals);
094        }
095
096}
